scripts.create-login-states: env LANGUAGE=en_US  pnpm exec playwright test --project setup
scripts.record-test-admin: pnpm run create-login-states && pnpm exec playwright codegen --load-storage=src/states/admin@example.com.json project-331.local
scripts.record-test-assistant: pnpm run create-login-states && pnpm exec playwright codegen --load-storage=src/states/assistant@example.com.json project-331.local
scripts.record-test-creator: pnpm run create-login-states && pnpm exec playwright codegen --load-storage=src/states/creator@example.com.json project-331.local
scripts.record-test-teacher: pnpm run create-login-states && pnpm exec playwright codegen --load-storage=src/states/teacher@example.com.json project-331.local
scripts.record-test-user: pnpm run create-login-states && pnpm exec playwright codegen --load-storage=src/states/user@example.com.json project-331.local
scripts.test: env HTML=1 LANGUAGE=en_US pnpm run test-nohtml
scripts.test-debug: env PWDEBUG=1 SKIP_TAKING_SCREENSHOTS=1 pnpm run test-nohtml
scripts.test-nohtml: env LANGUAGE=en_US pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test-slowmo: env SLOWMO=1000 LANGUAGE=en_US pnpm run test-nohtml -- --headed
